name: Unthread
headline: Agentic service management in Slack
description:
Unthread is an AI-powered helpdesk built natively into Slack. We help companies to automate the creation and resolution of tickets right from a Slack channel.

We work with IT, HR, and CX teams at some of the world's largest companies to resolve tickets instantly using AI.

founders.name: Tom Bachant, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Unthread. Previously founder of Dashride (acquired by Cruise in 2018).

## Products
####  Slack Channel Support 
Track conversations in shared channels with customers.
####  AI-Generated Support 
Automate your support responses and insights with AI.
####  Shared Email Inbox 
Receive and send emails from one place & sync with Slack.
####  In-App Live Chat 
Chat with your customers in real-time right from a Slack channel.

[ Get a Demo  ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/demo>)
For IT, HR, CS, and other operations teams
# Agentic Service Management in Slack
Automatically track tickets from Slack and use AI to prioritize, assign, and resolve instantly.
[ Learn more ](https://unthread.io/<#features>)
[ Get a Demo ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/demo/>)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/home-approval-request.png)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/response.png)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/home-approved.png)
![A sample conversation between a user and a support agent](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/home-conversation.png)
## Create Your Support Agent in Slack
### 1
###  Track New Conversations 
All new conversations are automatically tracked as tickets with assignment & alerts
### 2
###  Set Alerts to Meet Your SLAs 
Measure and improve your response times with assignment logic and clear escalation paths
### 3
###  Integrate and Automate 
Connect to your task managers, HRIS, Okta, and more to automate the resolution of requests.
### Trusted by world class teams
![Intuit logo](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Intuit-Logo-scaled.jpg)
![Cribl logo](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/cribl-logo-cropped.png)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/apollo.png)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/thirdweb.png)
![LangChain Logo](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/langchain-logo.png)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/inbox-preview-3.png)
## Powerful ticketing built for humans & AI
While customers reach out in Slack, your team members have a powerful back-office ticketing tool to navigate the queue, kick off automations, and seamlessly hand off between human and AI responses.
[ Watch it in action (5 min) ](https://unthread.io/<https:/www.loom.com/share/025b539ef4dd46eca3d78ed0c6ac46c4>)
## Try the first inbox built for Slack support
üôã Assign ownership of incoming messages
üôå View your assignments directly within Slack
üßò‍‚ôÄÔ∏è Close them out when you‚Äôre done ‚Äî reach inbox zero
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/slack-inbox-1.png)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Chatbot-Conversion-Image.webp)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/sla-breached.png)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Chatbot-Conversion-Ornament.webp)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/notify-on-call.png)
## Get faster responses and faster resolutions
Not all messages are created equal. Prioritize important tickets, easily loop in colleagues, and escalate to reach your SLA targets.
## Understand common issues and trends
ü¶æ Automatically categorize incoming ticket types
üßë‍üî¨ Analyze response and resolution time per category
üîÆ Learn where your documentation is missing or out of date
[ Learn more ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/ai-powered-support/>)
![Example of Unthread AI categorizing conversations](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/ai.png)
## One place to manage all incoming tickets
Unthread is an omni-channel inbox that aggregates tickets and data across any source that your customers use.
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/slack-box.png)
### Manage Slack Channels or Slack DMs
Automatically track tickets from Slack channels or let users DM a support bot for private ticket creation.
[ Learn more ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/slack-connect-support/>)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/email-box.png)
### Manage Support Emails Alongside Slack
Forward support emails into Slack to create private threads about each new message.
[ Learn more ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/shared-email-inbox-in-slack/>)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/widget-box.png)
### Embed Live Chat and Customer Portals
With a few lines of code, you can provide a live chat interface or a ticket dashboard customized to your brand.
[ Learn more ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/in-app-chat-widget/>)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Chatbot-Audience-Image-2.webp)
### Use AI to answer questions and automate tasks
Aggregate data across all ticket sources and track where customers are engaging the most.
[ Learn more ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/slack-connect-support/>)
### Create Your Own Workflows With Our Powerful API
Our full API and webhook support allows you to extend the Unthread platform and integrate with internal tools and processes.
[ Read our docs ](https://unthread.io/<https:/docs.unthread.io/api-introduction/using-api>)
## Even more features
####  CRM Sync 
All new conversations are automatically tracked as tickets with assignment & alerts
####  Helpdesk integration 
Sync tickets to your helpdesk, and generate AI responses directly from your documentation
####  Task manager integration 
Create tasks in Jira, Asana, Linear, and almost any other task manager and get real-time updates
####  Triage channels 
Cross-post customer conversations into an internal channel for private discussion
####  Kanban ticket view 
Manage your tickets from Slack or the web with our flexible kanban ticket board
####  Analytics 
Get comprehensive analytics on response time, resolution time, common issues, and more
####  On-call rotations 
All new conversations are automatically tracked as tickets with assignment & alerts
####  Auto-responses 
Generate responses created by AI or set by your team, based on question type and even time of day
####  Multi-channel broadcasts 
Design Slack messages with our drag & drop builder, and get analytics on channel engagement
## Integrated with your favorite tools
Connect to task managers, CRMs,data warehouses, existing support platforms, and so much more.
[ All Integrations ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/integrations/>)
![](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/integrations-1.png)
###  Security built for the enterprise 
SOC2 Type 2 compliance and industry-leading security practices mean your data is safe. 
[ Learn more about security ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/security/>)
## How Unthread Works Across Industries
### **Productivity Tools**
Get faster product feedback loops by creating a shared channel.
![](https://unthread-3bdf4f.ingress-florina.ewp.live/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/haystack-300x103.png)
### **Fintech**
Increase transparency and reduce risk with instant communication over Slack.
![](https://unthread-3bdf4f.ingress-florina.ewp.live/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/herondata-300x94.png)
### **Infrastructure SaaS**
Provide top-tier support for critical customer infrastructure.
![](https://unthread-3bdf4f.ingress-florina.ewp.live/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/spacelift-300x98.png)
### **Agencies**
Build closer relationships by having a direct line to customers.
![](https://unthread-3bdf4f.ingress-florina.ewp.live/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/volley-300x138.png)
### **Open Source Software**
Grow an open-source community with a Slack support workspace.
**![](https://unthread-3bdf4f.ingress-florina.ewp.live/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/elementary-300x69.png)**

### **Open Source Software**
Grow an open-source community with a Slack support workspace.
**![](https://unthread-3bdf4f.ingress-florina.ewp.live/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/elementary-300x69.png)**
### **Productivity Tools**
Get faster product feedback loops by creating a shared channel.
![](https://unthread-3bdf4f.ingress-florina.ewp.live/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/haystack-300x103.png)
[ View more customers ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/customers/>)
## Start automating your ticketing in Slack
Start tracking your conversations and keep your customers in the loop. Connect your first channel for free.
[ Get started with a 14-day trial ](https://unthread.io/<https:/unthread.io/demo/>)
No credit card required.
![Unthread Logo](https://unthread.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/logo-dark.png)
Unthread‚Äôs mission is to make conversational support scalable and enjoyable.
  * Backed by Y Combinator

generated_description:
### Unthread: Simplifying Support Within Slack

**Company Overview**  
Founded in 2021 and based in New York, Unthread is a clever software solution designed for organizations that rely on Slack for collaboration. It‚Äôs an AI-powered helpdesk embedded right into Slack, aimed primarily at automating ticket creation and resolution processes, making support operations both efficient and user-friendly.

**Mission Statement**  
Unthread‚Äôs mission is straightforward: enabling agentic service management within Slack. They believe that support should be conversational, scalable, and enjoyable. By focusing on automating ticketing processes, Unthread seeks to free up teams to engage more meaningfully with colleagues and customers alike.

**Team & Backing**  
They‚Äôre a tightly-knit team of seven, backed by a respected name in the startup space‚ÄîY Combinator, having graduated from the Batch S22. Their Group Partner at Y Combinator, Aaron Epstein, adds a layer of mentorship and industry insight to the venture.

**Target Audience & Usage**  
Unthread caters to IT, HR, and Customer Experience (CX) teams at major corporations worldwide, helping them to instantly resolve tickets using AI. Their platform allows organizations to automate responses, thereby enhancing efficiency and speeding up resolution times.

**Core Products & Solutions**  
Unthread offers a range of features integrated into Slack, such as:

- **Slack Channel Support**: To track conversations happening in shared channels.
- **AI-Generated Support**: Active automation of responses and insights.
- **Shared Email Inbox**: A unified place for email engagement synced with Slack.
- **In-App Live Chat**: Real-time customer interactions within Slack.

Additionally, they provide specific ticketing solutions tailored for various functions, including IT, HR, customer support, and customer success.

**Key Features**  
- **Automated Ticket Tracking**: Capture and manage all incoming queries as tickets.
- **AI-Powered Insights**: Utilize AI to prioritize and categorize tickets, enabling smarter workflows.
- **Multi-channel Management**: Manage tickets received from Slack, emails, and more‚Äîall in one place.
- **Integrations**: Unthread plays nicely with task managers, CRMs, and existing helpdesk systems, enhancing its adaptability.

**Security & Compliance**  
Unthread adheres to stringent security standards, boasting SOC 2 compliance, ensuring the protection of sensitive data for businesses.

**Who‚Äôs Using Unthread?**  
Their client roster includes prominent names like Intuit, Cribl, and LangChain, emphasizing their credibility and traction within the market.

**Conclusion**  
If your team is looking to streamline ticket management right within Slack while harnessing the latest in AI technology, Unthread presents a compelling option. Their approach to conversational support truly emphasizes making operations both efficient and pleasant for everyone involved. You can explore more on their [website](https://unthread.io) and even get started with a demo trial.
